title: Why is Headhunter Akali unavailable?
body: Anyone Know? Just curious because Headhunter Nidalee is still available.

replies.body: Ah ok. Thanks people. Thought it was out already and I'd missed seeing it or simply hadn't seen it yet.
~~Akali doesn't have a headhunter skin~~. ~~If she does~~ its not released yet.
Oh ok. Well it has the picture of it in the Skins Section of her Character Profile - must be yet to be released.

> [{quoted}](name=KiStorm,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ZuA8FiQ8,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-03-17T08:14:38.722+0000)
>
> Oh ok. Well it has the picture of it in the Skins Section of her Character Profile - must be yet to be released.

It's not released/activated yet. Most skins show in the champ bit before being released, just Google 'Headhunter Akali' and it'll take you to Surrender@20.
Yes, this patch. That's what happens when Riot is going to release a skin in a patch.
